T02D1264:14b-3: dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i sgrub pa'i thabs /
T02D1264:14b-4: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1264:14b-5: dpal ldan dgyes pa'i rdo rje bde ba mchog gi ga 'phang rnam par mi rtog par gcig sku //
T02D1264:14b-6: brtan dang g-yo ba ma lus lus pa med pa'i
T02D1264:14b-7: dngos po'i rang bzhin bsod nams ye shes las byung
T02D1264:14b-8: nyid // dri ma bsal zhing dga' ba kun gyis rgyas 'gyur mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor lo'i mgon //
T02D1264:14b-9: de la dngos po kun gyis btud nas de yi sgrub thabs gsal zhing yangs pa bshad //
T02D1264:14b-10: bla ma dam pa'i gzhung lugs ni //
T02D1264:14b-11: shin tu rnyed dka' gang thos pas //
T02D1264:14b-12: de zhabs padma la btud nas //
T02D1264:14b-13: bdag nyid dran pa'i phyir yang ngo //
T02D1264:14b-14: 'di ltar yang drag cing rgal dga' ba'i /
T02D1264:14b-15: 'khor ba'i g-yang sa chen po shin tu 'jigs pas
T02D1264:14b-16: skyo bar gyur pa'i sems can gyi khams la bltas
T02D1264:14b-17: la snying rje mchog gi ros bsgoms pa'i sems kyis
T02D1264:14b-18: 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor 'khyams pa bsgral ba'i thabs dang
T02D1264:14b-19: ldan par bla ma la brnyas pa la sogs pa'i
T02D1264:14b-20: skyon spangs pa / sbyin pa la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa /
T02D1264:14b-21: dbang po las rgyal ba bdud rtsi lnga la sogs pa'i dam tshig bstan pa /
T02D1264:14b-22: dpal dgyes pa'i rdo rjer gsungs pa'i dkyil 'khor du
T02D1264:14b-23: dbang bskur zhing / yang dag par rjes su gnang
T02D1264:14b-25: dur khrod la sogs pa yid dang mthun pa'i gnas
T02D1264:14b-26: 'ga' zhig tu nyi ma dang zla ba dang chu
T02D1264:14b-27: dang dri dang sman gyi khyad par gyis dag par
T02D1264:14b-28: byas pa'i sa'i char gnas pa la tho rangs kyis
T02D1264:14b-29: langs nas // chos kyi dbyings kyi bdag nyid kyi //
T02D1264:14b-30: ro ni dang por bsgom par bya //
T02D1264:14b-31: de yi snying la gnas byas la //
T02D1264:14b-32: go 'phang mchog ni bsgom par bya //
T02D1264:14b-33: rdo rje skyil krung gis 'dug la //
T02D1264:14b-34: bsam gtan phyag rgyas lag bsdams pas //
T02D1264:14b-35: rang gi snying gar re kh'a bsgom / de las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor te //
T02D1264:14b-36: der ni h'um las byung ba yi //
T02D1264:14b-37: shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin nyid //
T02D1264:14b-38: kha dog nag po 'jigs chen po //
T02D1264:14b-39: h'um las byung ba'i rdo rje'o //
T02D1264:15a-0: @15a * // rdo rje'i lte ba'i dbus gnas pa //
T02D1264:15a-1: h'um gi de nyid yang dag bsgom //
T02D1264:15a-2: h'um yig gyur pa la blta ba //
T02D1264:15a-3: zhe sdang bdag nyid rnam par bsgom //
T02D1264:15a-4: rdo rje las skyes nag po che //
T02D1264:15a-5: 'dam skyes sngon po 'dra ba'i mdog / rang gi lha yi gzugs nyid ni //
T02D1264:15a-6: man ngag ji bzhin rnam pa gsum //
T02D1264:15a-7: gsum gyi nang na rnal 'byor bas //
T02D1264:15a-8: mos pa ji bzhin bsgom par bya //
T02D1264:15a-9: mdangs chen dpa' bo gcig pu nyid //
T02D1264:15a-10: dad pa nyid kyis bsgom par bya //
T02D1264:15a-11: de nas snying ga'i nyi ma la sa bon gnyug
T02D1264:15a-12: ma bkod la de'i 'od kyis spyan drangs pa'i bcom
T02D1264:15a-13: ldan 'das bsgom par bya ba'i gzugs rang gi 'khor
T02D1264:15a-14: dang bcas pa mdun gyi nam mkha' la bltas la
T02D1264:15a-15: / snying ga'i sa bon las byung pa'i ston ka'i
T02D1264:15a-16: nam mkha' dri ma med pa lta bu mchod pa
T02D1264:15a-17: rnam pa sna tshogs kyi khyad par lag pa'i yal
T02D1264:15a-18: ga na thogs shing sgeg pa'i 'og tu goo r'i
T02D1264:15a-19: la sogs pa lha mo brgyad po rnams kyis phyi
T02D1264:15a-20: rol gyi mchod pa'i khyad par gyis go rims bzhin
T02D1264:15a-22: de la goo r'i ni ri dags kyi mtshan ma 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1264:15a-25: za phod ma ni stobs so //
T02D1264:15a-28: tsandal'i ni je chung drug pa'o //
T02D1264:15a-29: do mbi n'i ni 'khyud pa'i tshul du ston to //
T02D1264:15a-30: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di nyid kyi spyan snga
T02D1264:15a-31: ru thog ma med pa'i dus kyi bag chags kyis
T02D1264:15a-32: bskyed pa'i sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa bya'o
T02D1264:15a-33: // bdag gis sdig pa bgyis pa dang /
T02D1264:15a-35: bgyi dpal rjes su yi rang ba'i sdig pa thams cad bshags par bya'o //
T02D1264:15a-36: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /
T02D1264:15a-37: so so'i skye bo'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ma lus pa la rjes su yi rang ngo //
T02D1264:15a-38: bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba gang cung zad ci
T02D1264:15a-39: bgyis pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa
T02D1264:15a-40: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su
T02D1264:15a-41: bsngo bar bgyi'o // de ltar bdag byang chub kyi
T02D1264:15a-42: snying po la mchis kyi bar du dngos po thams
T02D1264:15a-43: cad kyi rang bzhin gyi bde ba chen po'i rnam
T02D1264:15a-44: pa can dgyes pa'i rnam pa'i rdo rje sangs rgyas
T02D1264:15b-0: des bstan pa'i bskyed pa @15b dang rdzogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi chos la skyabs su mchi'o //
T02D1264:15b-1: de'i 'khor lor gnas pa'i mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs kyi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o //
T02D1264:15b-2: 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i chur nub pa'i sems can 'di
T02D1264:15b-3: dag la bdag he ru ka'i ngo bor gyur pas
T02D1264:15b-4: rdo rje theg pa'i chos bstan pa'i gru rab tu
T02D1264:15b-5: byin pas yang dag pa'i gzung bas sgyu ma lta
T02D1264:15b-6: bu gnyis su med pa'i mchog tu dga' ba'i phung
T02D1264:15b-7: po'i bdag nyid kyi mtshan nyid can la rab tu
T02D1264:15b-8: gzhag par bgyi zhes byang chub tu sems bskyed par
T02D1264:15b-9: bgyi'o // dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i rnal 'byor bla na
T02D1264:15b-10: med pa'i bla ma sangs rgyas sgrub pa la 'di
T02D1264:15b-11: las gnyis pa gzhan med pa'i thabs kyi mchog 'di
T02D1264:15b-12: la bdag gis brten par bgyi'o zhes bya'o //
T02D1264:15b-13: de nas sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa
T02D1264:15b-14: ltar brtse ba'i mtshan nyid kyi byams pa chen po
T02D1264:15b-15: dang sdug bsngal dang sdug bsngal gyi rgyu las gzung
T02D1264:15b-16: bar 'dod pa'i snying rje chen po dang /
T02D1264:15b-17: sems can thams cad la dga' ba chen po 'jug
T02D1264:15b-18: pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi dga' ba chen po dang
T02D1264:15b-19: / brtags pa'i yul ma lus pa la btang snyoms pa'i mtshan nyid can btang snyoms bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1264:15b-20: de nas chos thams cad ni sems kyi rnam par
T02D1264:15b-21: brtags pa'o zhes yid kyi dmigs pa de dang de'i
T02D1264:15b-22: rnam par rab tu snang ba 'di dag ni sems
T02D1264:15b-24: mya ngan la sogs pas rnam par 'khrul ba bzhin
T02D1264:15b-25: du sems las gzhan pa'i gzung ba 'di ni yod
T02D1264:15b-27: gzung ba med par 'dzin pa'i sems kyang yod pa ma yin no //
T02D1264:15b-28: de lta bas na sna tshogs 'di dag sems kyi
T02D1264:15b-29: rang bzhin du rtogs par bya'o zhes don de nyid
T02D1264:15b-30: bstan par byas nas rdzas ma lus pa'i de kho
T02D1264:15b-31: na nyid kyi snying po bsdus pa'i sngags brjod par
T02D1264:15b-32: bya zhing tha mal pa'i rnam pa gzhig par bya
T02D1264:15b-33: ste / aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham zhes bya'o //
T02D1264:15b-34: de nas sngags kyi don mngon sum du byas la /
T02D1264:15b-35: 'gro ba thams cad rang bzhin med pa'i rmi lam
T02D1264:15b-36: du nye bar dmigs pa bzhin du rnam pa thams
T02D1264:15b-37: cad dang bral ba'i mtshan nyid can sgyu ma lta
T02D1264:15b-38: bu'i ston ka'i nam mkha' dri ma med pa'i dkyil
T02D1264:15b-39: lta bur bltas la 'di nyid ni bcom ldan 'das
T02D1264:16a-0: @16a * // ma bdag med ma zhes bya'o //
T02D1264:16a-1: nga ni smon lam dang rjes su dran pa'i rgyu mthun par gyur pa'i rnam pa ltar /
T02D1264:16a-2: bsdus pa'i 'khor lo dag pa'i 'jig rten pa'i rang bzhin bsgoms te /
T02D1264:16a-3: mdun du sna tshogs padma'i gdan la gnas pa'i ram
T02D1264:16a-4: las byung ba'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la yi ge
T02D1264:16a-6: de las byung ba'i sna tshogs rdo rje kha dog nag po 'jigs su rung ba /
T02D1264:16a-7: kha dog lnga pa rtse mo gsum pa'o //
T02D1264:16a-8: de'i dkyil du'ang nyi ma de la yi ge h'um dgod do //
T02D1264:16a-9: de la khro bo 'og mdung rtse //
T02D1264:16a-10: 'jig dus me ltar bzod dka' ba //
T02D1264:16a-11: sdigs mdzub g-yon gyi khu tshur snying //
T02D1264:16a-12: bdud kyi dkyil 'khor bsdigs par byed //
T02D1264:16a-13: rdo rje 'bar ba g-yas pa na //
T02D1264:16a-14: zhal ni h'um gis gang bar gyur //
T02D1264:16a-15: dpa' bo stag gi pags pa bsnams //
T02D1264:16a-16: phyag rgya lnga yis rgyan du byas //
T02D1264:16a-17: drag po chen po kha dog gnag /'jigs pa shin tu 'jigs pa ste ;
T02D1264:16a-18: / khrag 'dzag mgo yi phreng ba can //
T02D1264:16a-20: skra ni dmar ser gyen du 'greng //
T02D1264:16a-21: lce ni bsgyur zhing gar thabs can //
T02D1264:16a-22: spyan gsum dag dang yang dag ldan //
T02D1264:16a-23: mche ba cung zad gtsigs pa can //
T02D1264:16a-24: phyogs dang mtshams rnams kun du yang //
T02D1264:16a-25: khro bo'i tshogs rnams spro bya zhing //
T02D1264:16a-27: rang gi mtshams nas phur bus gdab //
T02D1264:16a-28: aom raksha raksha h'um h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a zhes ji snyed 'dod pa'i bar du'o //
T02D1264:16a-29: de'i nang du nyi ma dang sna tshogs rdo rje'i
T02D1264:16a-30: 'od zer 'jig pa'i dus kyi me lce'i rtse mo
T02D1264:16a-31: ltar gcig tu gyur nas phyogs mtshams su 'phros pas
T02D1264:16a-34: steng rdo rje'i gur dang 'og tu ni de yongs
T02D1264:16a-35: su gyur pa las rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyis gzhir
T02D1264:16a-36: 'og rim bdun gyi bar du bsam par bya'o //
T02D1264:16a-37: de'i dbus su h'um yongs su gyur pa las /
T02D1264:16a-38: chos kyi 'byung gnas kyi gzugs ston ka'i ri bong
T02D1264:16a-39: can gyi rnam pa lta bu rdo rje 'chang chen
T02D1264:16a-40: po'i ngo bo rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i ngo mtshar
T02D1264:16a-41: chen po'i 'od zer gyi tshogs mngon par 'byung ba'i
T02D1264:16a-42: 'og phra ba steng yangs pa zur gsum pa'i nang
T02D1264:16a-43: stong pa'i dbus na gnas pa'i padma 'dab ma sna
T02D1264:16a-44: tshogs dang sna tshogs pa'i rdo rje'o //
T02D1264:16b-0: @16b de'i lte ba la 'byung ba chen po bzhi
T02D1264:16b-1: dkyil 'khor bzhi'i ngo bo rnam pa sna tshogs pa
T02D1264:16b-2: pukka s'i la sogs pa lha mo bzhi'i rang bzhin
T02D1264:16b-3: gong nas gong du blta bar bya'o //
T02D1264:16b-4: de la dang por ni yam las byung ba'i rlung
T02D1264:16b-5: gi dkyil 'khor zla ba phyed pa lta bu sngon
T02D1264:16b-6: po rtse mo gnyis su g-yo ba'i ba dan gyis
T02D1264:16b-7: mtshan pa'o ; / ram las me'i dkyil 'khor gru
T02D1264:16b-8: gsum pa rtse mo phra ba dmar po 'od kyi
T02D1264:16b-9: phreng ba dmar pos mtshan pa'o //
T02D1264:16b-10: de'i steng du bam las byung ba'i chu'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1264:16b-11: zlum po kha dog dkar po bum pas mtshan pa'o
T02D1264:16b-12: // de'i steng du lam las byung ba sa'i dkyil
T02D1264:16b-13: 'khor grub bzhi pa kha dog ser po zur rnams
T02D1264:16b-14: su rdo rje rtse gsum pas mtshan pa'o //
T02D1264:16b-15: de'i steng du rnam par shes pa sgyu ma lta bu nyid du brtags pa'o //
T02D1264:16b-16: sna tshogs rdo rje'i lte ba la 'byung chen bzhi
T02D1264:16b-17: yongs su gyur pa las mdor bsdus nas sangs rgyas
T02D1264:16b-18: kyi zhing yongs su dag pa byang chub kyi phyogs
T02D1264:16b-19: kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun rnam par dag pa
T02D1264:16b-20: rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i rang bzhin nor bu
T02D1264:16b-21: rnam pa sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i gzhal yas khang
T02D1264:16b-22: dpag tu med cing mtha' yas pa'i 'jig rten gyi
T02D1264:16b-23: khams sgyu ma lta bur ston pa'i dur khros kyis
T02D1264:16b-24: yongs su bskor ba bsgom par bya ste /
T02D1264:16b-25: zur bzhi pa ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes pa sgo khyud bzhis mdzes par byas pa /
T02D1264:16b-26: rta babs bzhis brgyan pa dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa dang /
T02D1264:16b-27: me long dang me tog gi phreng ba dang /
T02D1264:16b-30: rdo rje thig gis brgyan pa /
T02D1264:16b-31: sangs rgyas kyi tshogs 'phros pas mdzes pa /
T02D1264:16b-32: g-yo ba'i ba dan yid du 'ong ba'i rtse mo'i
T02D1264:16b-33: phyogs kyi sgo rnams las dril bu'i sgra sgrogs pa
T02D1264:16b-34: / 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yang dag par bkod pas nyams su dga' ba'o //
T02D1264:16b-35: de'i dkyil du sna tshogs padma 'dab ma brgyad pa ge sar dang bcas pa'o //
T02D1264:16b-36: de bzhin phyogs mtshams pad ma ni //
T02D1264:16b-37: rang rang stan gyi ge sar la ;
T02D1264:16b-38: / tshangs dbang nye dbang drag po dang //
T02D1264:16b-39: de bzhin gshin rje gnod sbyin dang //
T02D1264:16b-40: bden bral dang ni thags bzangs ris //
T02D1264:16b-41: rgyas par goo r'i la sogs kyi'o //
T02D1264:16b-42: lho dang nub dang byang dag dang //
T02D1264:16b-43: dbus su bdud ni bzhi po dag / dbyibs dang kha dog ji lta bu //
T02D1264:17a-2: bdud rnams dag ni thams cad kyi //
T02D1264:17a-3: snying la nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1264:17a-4: bgegs rnams bred pa de dang de //
T02D1264:17a-5: skyabs tshol ba la gcig pu 'bad //
T02D1264:17a-6: de la dbus kyi 'dab ma la ni lugs su 'byung ba dang /
T02D1264:17a-7: lugs las bzlog pa'i aa la sogs pa dbyangs kyi yi ge nyis 'gyur du byas pa /
T02D1264:17a-8: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshon
T02D1264:17a-9: par byed pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor me long lta
T02D1264:17a-10: bu'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin no //
T02D1264:17a-11: de'i steng du yi ge ksha bor ba'i ka la
T02D1264:17a-12: sogs pa'i yi ge dha da bha ya ra la
T02D1264:17a-13: wa dang bcas pa'i lugs su 'byung ba dang ;
T02D1264:17a-14: lugs las bzlog pa nyis 'gyur du byung ba de
T02D1264:17a-15: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu mtshon par byed pa'i
T02D1264:17a-16: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes
T02D1264:17a-18: de'i dkyil du sa bon gyi yi ge h'um aam ngo //
T02D1264:17a-19: de dag yongs su gyur pa las rang gi stan
T02D1264:17a-20: la gnas pa'i sa bon gnyis kyi snying po las
T02D1264:17a-23: thod pa la gnas pa so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin bsam par bya'o //
T02D1264:17a-24: de'i 'od zer las byung ba'i mkha' 'gro ma'i rnam
T02D1264:17a-25: pa lta bu'i thub pa mchog gi tshogs kyis 'jig
T02D1264:17a-26: rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa la rnam par
T02D1264:17a-27: gzigs pas de dag tu gtogs pa'i sems can rnams
T02D1264:17a-28: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su byas nas
T02D1264:17a-29: / slar log nas gcig tu gyur par byas pa
T02D1264:17a-30: ni bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes kyi rang
T02D1264:17a-31: / bzhin no // de nas nyi ma dang zla
T02D1264:17a-32: ba dang phyag mtshan dang sa bon las yongs su
T02D1264:17a-33: gyur pa'i bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po
T02D1264:17a-34: ni dpe med pa'i tshogs kyi rdul phra rab las
T02D1264:17a-35: yongs su bsgrubs pa bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin
T02D1264:17a-36: 'chad par 'gyur ba'i phyag dang zhal dang mdog dang
T02D1264:17a-37: dbyibs kyis mtshon pa'i rgyur gyur pa'o //
T02D1264:17a-38: de lta bu'i bdag med ma ni sku la 'khyud
T02D1264:17a-39: pa chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa'i
T02D1264:17a-41: de lta bu'i mngon par byang chub pa rnam pa lnga'o //
T02D1264:17a-42: de'i thugs ka nas byung ba'i 'od zer gyi tshogs
T02D1264:17a-43: kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs ma lus pa he
T02D1264:17a-44: ru ka'i gzugs su rdzogs par byas nas spyan drangs
T02D1264:17a-45: nas bcug pa zhu bar gyur pa las gam la
T02D1264:17b-0: @17b sogs pa'i sa bon brgyad las byung ba'i goo
T02D1264:17b-1: r'i la sogs mkha' 'gro ma spro zhing dran par
T02D1264:17b-2: bya'o // de nas nam mkha' la dri za'i sems
T02D1264:17b-3: can phra ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi gzugs can kha dog
T02D1264:17b-4: dmar po ho dmar po'i phreng ba gnyis kyis yongs
T02D1264:17b-6: snying gar 'od kyis spyan drangs shing bcug nas bla
T02D1264:17b-7: ma'i man ngag nyid kyis gnas ji lta ba bzhin
T02D1264:17b-9: de nas rdo rje can rang gi rig pa dang
T02D1264:17b-10: bcas pa 'dod chags chen pos zhu bar gyur pas
T02D1264:17b-11: ston ka'i zla ba dri ma med pa lta bur
T02D1264:17b-12: zhu bar gyur nas bde ba chen po'i mthar gnas
T02D1264:17b-13: par bya'o // de nas pukka s'i la sogs pa
T02D1264:17b-14: lha mo bzhi shin tu 'dod pa'i tshul gyis 'ongs
T02D1264:17b-15: nas rang rang gi phyogs su 'dug ste /
T02D1264:17b-16: thugs sad par byed pa'i rdo rje'i glus bcom ldan 'das slong bar byed pa /
T02D1264:17b-17: bzhengs shig dang sgrol thugs rje'i thugs //
T02D1264:17b-18: pukka s'i ni bdag la skyobs //
T02D1264:17b-19: stong pa'i rang bzhin nyid spongs la //
T02D1264:17b-20: bdag la bde chen sbyor bzhed mdzod //
T02D1264:17b-21: khyod mi bzhugs na bdag 'gum pas //
T02D1264:17b-22: dgyes pa'i rdo rje khyod bzhengs shig / stong pa'i rang bzhin nyid spongs la //
T02D1264:17b-24: bdag gtso 'jig rten mgron gnyer nas //
T02D1264:17b-25: stong pa nyid la bzhugs sam ci //
T02D1264:17b-26: khyod med phyogs ni ma 'tshal bas //
T02D1264:17b-28: bdag gis khyod kyi thugs 'tshal gyis //
T02D1264:17b-29: mig 'phrul mnga' ba khyod bzhengs shig / dom bi mo bdag sgren mo lags //
T02D1264:17b-30: thugs rje rgyun chad ma mdzad cig / ces pa'o //
T02D1264:17b-31: de nas glu'i ngo bor rmi lam sad pa bzhin
T02D1264:17b-32: du zla ba zhu ba de bsdus pa las byung
T02D1264:17b-34: de dag yongs su gyur pa las phyag mtshan gnyis so //
T02D1264:17b-35: de'i dkyil du nyi ma dang zla ba la gnas pa'i sa bon de gnyis nyid de /
T02D1264:17b-36: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin blta bar bya'o //
T02D1264:17b-37: de las mkha' 'gro ma'i rnam pa can gyi de
T02D1264:17b-38: bzhin gshegs pa rnams yang dag par spro zhing yang
T02D1264:17b-39: dag par bsdus pa'i sbyor bas de dag thams cad
T02D1264:17b-40: sgyu ma lta bu dang rmi lam lta bu'i sems
T02D1264:17b-41: kyi rang bzhin gnyug ma la ltos par dpag par
T02D1264:18a-0: bya zhing / zla ba dang nyi ma phyag mtshan @18a * //
T02D1264:18a-1: dang sa bon yongs su gyur pa las byung ba'i
T02D1264:18a-2: he ru ka'i gzugs bdag med ma dang snyoms par
T02D1264:18a-3: 'jug pa'i bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1264:18a-4: zhabs rnams sa la brten mdzad cing //
T02D1264:18a-5: lha dang lha min bsdigs par mdzad //
T02D1264:18a-6: mig ni dmar zhing zlum la 'gyur //
T02D1264:18a-7: khros shing sgeg pa ral ba can //
T02D1264:18a-8: zhabs ni bzhi dang zhal brgyad dang //
T02D1264:18a-9: phyag ni bcu drug dag gis brgyan //
T02D1264:18a-10: phung po nyon mongs 'chi bdag lha'i //
T02D1264:18a-11: bu yi bdud bzhi mnyam par gnon //
T02D1264:18a-12: skyil krung phyed pa'i gar thabs can //
T02D1264:18a-13: khrag 'dzag mgo bo lnga bcu'i phreng //
T02D1264:18a-14: shin tu 'jigs rung nyam par [*ngar?] gnas //
T02D1264:18a-15: spyi gtsug sna tshogs rdo rje 'dzin //
T02D1264:18a-17: zhal nas h'um ni sgrogs mdzad cing //
T02D1264:18a-18: sku la thal ba'i rdul gyis bsgos //
T02D1264:18a-20: rtsa ba'i zhal dang sku lus can //
T02D1264:18a-23: g-yas dang g-yon pa'i zhal mdog go //
T02D1264:18a-24: steng ma'i zhal ni dud mdog 'dra //
T02D1264:18a-26: lhag ma'i zhal ni bzhi pa'o //
T02D1264:18a-27: zhal kun kyang mche ba gtsigs pa spyan gsum gyis mdzes pa //
T02D1264:18a-28: dpral ba'i steng du thod pa'i du ma bu lngas brgyan pa /
T02D1264:18a-30: skra dmar ser gyen du 'greng ba /
T02D1264:18a-31: gcer bu gar dgu dang ldan pa //
T02D1264:18a-32: phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan //
T02D1264:18a-33: 'khor lo rna cha mgul rgyan dang //
T02D1264:18a-34: lag pa gang du bu ska rags so //
T02D1264:18a-35: glo dang dbugs rgod de bzhin skyo //
T02D1264:18a-36: za byed mdze dang za g-ya' dang //
T02D1264:18a-37: dmu chu spri ha'i rang bzhin nyid //
T02D1264:18a-38: glang po rta bong glang rnga mo //
T02D1264:18a-39: de bzhin mi dang seng byi la //
T02D1264:18a-40: g-yas pa'i thod pa brgyad po ru //
T02D1264:18a-41: gnyis 'thung la sogs rim shes bya //
T02D1264:18a-42: sa dang chu dang me dang rlung //
T02D1264:18a-43: zla ba dang ni nyi ma dang //
T02D1264:18a-44: mthar byed dang ni nor sbyin rnams //
T02D1264:18a-45: g-yon pa'i thod pa brgyad na'o //
T02D1264:18a-46: lha mo bdag med ma de ni //
T02D1264:18a-47: phyag gnyis kyis ni rnam par brgyan //
T02D1264:18a-48: bdud bzhi'i khrag gis bkang ba yi //
T02D1264:18a-49: thod pa yis ni phyag g-yon brel //
T02D1264:18a-50: g-yas na nyon mongs gcod pa yi //
T02D1264:18a-51: gri gug bsnams par mdzad pa yin //
T02D1264:18a-52: gcer pu kha dog nag mo ste //
T02D1264:18b-1: spyan gsum gyis ni rnam par brgyan /
T02D1264:18b-2: g-yas brkyang pa yi gnas pas gnas //
T02D1264:18b-3: phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan //
T02D1264:18b-4: dpral ba'i steng du mgo skam phreng //
T02D1264:18b-5: mdzes pa dag gis mdzes par byas //
T02D1264:18b-6: khrag med mgo yi phreng ba yis //
T02D1264:18b-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka'i padma la gnas pa'i nyi ma la ni h'um ngo //
T02D1264:18b-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das ma'i thugs ka'i padma la
T02D1264:18b-10: gnas pa'i zla ba la yi ge aam blta bar
T02D1264:18b-17: srog song ba'i snying ga'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D1264:18b-18: steng du aa a'a ai a'i aum gi sa bon
T02D1264:18b-19: las skyes pas mtshan ma'i gri gug dang /
T02D1264:18b-20: zla ba dang nyi ma kha sbyor du byas pa yongs su gyur pa las /
T02D1264:18b-21: rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i mkha' 'gro ma dkar mo /
T02D1264:18b-25: ljang gu ni gti mug dang /
T02D1264:18b-29: phrag dog ni bdag med ma mkha' 'gro ma'i rang bzhin te /
T02D1264:18b-30: gri gug dang thod pa bsnams pa'i dkyil 'khor phyed pa'i gar gyis bzhugs pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1264:18b-31: rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i mkha' 'gro ma lnga
T02D1264:18b-32: po 'di dag ni rim pa ji lta ba bzhin
T02D1264:18b-37: rnam par shes pa'i phung por bsam par bya'o //
T02D1264:18b-38: de bzhin du gti mug dang /
T02D1264:18b-44: gzugs la sogs pa'i yul rnams la ni /
T02D1264:18b-54: rlung dang nam mkha' la ni /
T02D1264:18b-61: yid la ni sdig song ba'i snying ga'i zla ba'i
T02D1264:18b-62: dkyil 'khor gyi steng du aom a'am gi sa bon
T02D1264:18b-63: las skyes pa'i / dkar mo dang /
T02D1264:18b-68: bdag med ma'i rnal 'byor ma rnams rdo rje ma
T02D1264:18b-69: la sogs pa bzhin du yongs su rdzogs pas gnas
T02D1264:18b-70: nas su'o // sha ni pukka s'i ru grags //
T02D1264:19a-3: dom bi rkang tshil dag pa ste //
T02D1264:19a-4: 'di dag lha yi rnam dag go //
T02D1264:19a-5: da ni rnam par dag pa gzhan dag brjod par bya ste /
T02D1264:19a-6: pags pa byang chub yan lag bdun //
T02D1264:19a-7: rus pa 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi //
T02D1264:19a-8: thugs rje'i spyan ni dmar po ste //
T02D1264:19a-9: byams pa'i thugs kyis yan lag nag //
T02D1264:19a-10: bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi dag gis //
T02D1264:19a-11: zhabs bzhi dag tu dran par bya //
T02D1264:19a-12: zhal brgyad rnam par thar pa ste //
T02D1264:19a-13: phyag ni stong pa bcu drug go //
T02D1264:19a-14: tshad ni sangs rgyas lnga yin te //
T02D1264:19a-15: khro ba gdug pa 'dul ba po //
T02D1264:19a-16: spyan ni rnam dag rdo rje gsum //
T02D1264:19a-17: brten pa'i sems kyis dngos grub 'gyur //
T02D1264:19a-18: drug cu rtsa bzhi brgyad cu drug /'dab ma sum cu gnyis padma //
T02D1264:19a-19: sprul pa chos dang longs spyod dang //
T02D1264:19a-20: bde chen zhes bya go rims bzhin //
T02D1264:19a-21: lte ba snying ga mgrin pa mgor //
T02D1264:19a-22: 'khor lo bzhi po bsgom par bya //
T02D1264:19a-23: 'od zer lda po dkar dang nag / dmar dang sngo ba de bzhin te //
T02D1264:19a-24: aom h'um aam ham ci rigs par //
T02D1264:19a-25: steng dang 'og tu kha bltas nas //
T02D1264:19a-26: shes rab thabs kyi rnam dag gis //
T02D1264:19a-27: gnyis gnyis dag tu nye bar bstan //
T02D1264:19a-28: de nas rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gnyug ma'i
T02D1264:19a-29: 'od zer gyi tshogs kyis gdod ma nas grub pa'i
T02D1264:19a-30: khams gsum na bzhugs pa'i rgyal ba mchog gi tshogs
T02D1264:19a-31: spyan drangs pa nam mkhar bzhugs su gsol te /
T02D1264:19a-32: phyi dang nang dang gsang ba mchod pa'i khyad par gyis yang dag par mchod la /
T02D1264:19a-33: aom aa bhi shinytsa tu m'a sarba ta th'a ga ta zhes bya bas gsol ba btab pa dang /
T02D1264:19a-34: he ru ka'i gzugs su gyur pa'i de bzhin gshegs
T02D1264:19a-35: pa de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rang
T02D1264:19a-36: bzhin du bdud rtsi lnga'i rang bzhin bum pa lnga
T02D1264:19a-37: lag pa'i padmas gzung bas dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02D1264:19a-38: dbang bskur ma thag tu spyi bor thugs kyi bdag por gzhag go //
T02D1264:19a-39: me tog gi char dang gur gum gyi char yang 'bab par 'gyur ro //
T02D1264:19a-40: rnga'i sgra yang sgrogs par byed do //
T02D1264:19a-41: gzugs rdo rje la sogs pas kyang mchod par byed do //
T02D1264:19a-42: sangs rgyas spyan la sogs pas kyang stod par byed do //
T02D1264:19a-43: de'i rjes la rang rig pa thugs kar gnas pas
T02D1264:19a-44: dbang bskur bas mig la sogs pa 'thob par bsgoms
T02D1264:19b-0: la / tshogs lhag par @19b bya ba'i don du rigs lngas byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D1264:19b-7: aom h'um sva a'a: ha'a'i sa bon lnga las rdzogs pa'i rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02D1264:19b-11: don yod grub pa'i rang bzhin gyi rdul phra rab las bsgrubs pa'i sku can bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1264:19b-12: h'um dang aa'i sa bon las nges par byung ba'i
T02D1264:19b-13: padma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i ze ba la h'um dang
T02D1264:19b-14: aom las byung ba'i rnal 'byor ba'i rdo rje'i nor
T02D1264:19b-15: bu ji ltar rigs par sngags gnyis kyis byin gyis
T02D1264:19b-16: brlabs te / aom padma su kha bha ra ma h'a r'a r'a ga su kha dha ra /
T02D1264:19b-17: tsa tur a'a nanda bha ga bi sh'a h'um h'um h'um ka ryam ku ru shva me /
T02D1264:19b-18: tsa tur a'a nanda da ya ka kha ga mu khe ka r'a so n'a tha h'um h'um h'um /
T02D1264:19b-19: ka ryam ku ru shva me zhes bya ba de
T02D1264:19b-20: dang lhan cig tu dga' ba brtsam par bya'o zhes
T02D1264:19b-21: bya ba la sogs pa ni dang po'i rnal 'byor
T02D1264:19b-22: zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
T02D1264:19b-23: de'i rjes la rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyi
T02D1264:19b-24: 'od kyi lcags kyus he ru ka'i 'khor lo spyan
T02D1264:19b-25: drangs nas bdag nyid la bcug la zhu bar byas
T02D1264:19b-26: nas / zla ba zhu ba lta bur gyur pa padma'i nang du ltung ba las bskyed pa'o //
T02D1264:19b-27: rang gi sa bon dang phyag mtshan las rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbang phyug dang /
T02D1264:19b-28: goo r'i la sogs pa'i mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs bskyed cing /
T02D1264:19b-29: h'um aam gam tsam bam gham pam sham lam dam
T02D1264:19b-30: zhes bya ba'i 'byin pa'i sngags kyis sprul cing gdon
T02D1264:19b-31: no // de la bcom ldan 'das ma dang lhan
T02D1264:19b-32: cig bcom ldan 'das ji skad bstan pa'i phyag dang
T02D1264:19b-33: zhal sku mdog la sogs pas mtshon pa rang gi
T02D1264:19b-35: goo r'i kha dog nag mo ste //
T02D1264:19b-36: g-yas dang gzhan la gri gug dang //
T02D1264:19b-37: ro hi ta yi nya bsnams la //
T02D1264:19b-38: shar sgor nyi ma'i gdan la bsam par bya'o //
T02D1264:19b-39: de bzhin du tsoo r'i ni btsod kyi mdog lta
T02D1264:19b-40: bu rde'u chung dang phag pa bsnams pa lho'i gdan
T02D1264:19b-41: la'o // de bzhin du ro langs ma ni gser btso ma'i mdog lta bu rus sbal dang /
T02D1264:19b-42: padma'i snod bsnams pa nub kyi sgo'i gdan la'o //
T02D1264:19b-43: de bzhin du ghasma r'i ni nor bu ma ra ka ta lta bu ste /
T02D1264:19b-44: sprul dang rnal 'byor gyi snod bsnams pa byang phyogs kyi gdan la'o //
T02D1264:20a-0: de bzhin du pukka s'i ni aindra n'i @20a * //
T02D1264:20a-2: seng ge dang dgra sta bsnams pa dbang ldan mtshams kyi gdan la'o //
T02D1264:20a-3: de bzhin du sa ba r'i ni zla ba nya ba lta bu ste /
T02D1264:20a-4: dge slong dang 'khar gsil bsnams pa me'i mtshams gdan la'o //
T02D1264:20a-5: de bzhin du tsandal'i ni nam mkha' ltar sngo bsangs te /
T02D1264:20a-6: 'khor lo dang gshol mda' bsnams pa bden bral mtshams kyi gdan la'o //
T02D1264:20a-7: de bzhin dom bam n'i ni sna tshogs pa'i mdog
T02D1264:20a-8: can phyag na rdo rje dang sdigs mdzub bsnams pa
T02D1264:20a-9: ste / rlung gi mtshams kyi gdan la gnas par bsam par bya'o //
T02D1264:20a-10: rdo rje rnal 'byor ma kun kyang //
T02D1264:20a-11: skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis gnas //
T02D1264:20a-12: phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan //
T02D1264:20a-13: dbu skra dmar ser gyen du 'greng //
T02D1264:20a-14: spyan gsum dmar zhing zlum pa ste //
T02D1264:20a-15: khrag med mi mgo'i phreng ba yis //
T02D1264:20a-16: rnam par brgyan cing bdag po la //
T02D1264:20a-17: bde mchog sbyin pa gcer bu'o //
T02D1264:20a-18: zhes bya bas thams cad du yongs su rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la bltas la //
T02D1264:20a-19: phyag rgya byin rlabs sbyor ba yis //
T02D1264:20a-20: nyams med ye shes thob bya'i phyir //
T02D1264:20a-21: mtsho skyes rdo rjes bug pa ru //
T02D1264:20a-22: phat ser po ni bsam par bya //
T02D1264:20a-23: de nas rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od
T02D1264:20a-24: kyi lcags kyus ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor spyan drangs
T02D1264:20a-25: la / shar phyogs kyi sgor phyogs par bltas la yon chab la sogs pa phul te /
T02D1264:20a-26: aom badzra goo r'i a'a karsha ya dza: aom badzra tsoo r'i bra be sha ya h'um /
T02D1264:20a-27: aom badzra be t'a l'i bandha bam /
T02D1264:20a-28: aom badzra ghasma r'i to sha ya ho: zhes bya ba spyan drang ba dang /
T02D1264:20a-31: mnyes par byas pa dam tshig dang ye shes kyi
T02D1264:20a-32: dkyil 'khor gcig tu gyur pa rnam par bsams la
T02D1264:20a-33: / snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis rgyal
T02D1264:20a-34: ba mchog gi tshogs spyan drangs shing mchod la dbang
T02D1264:20a-35: bskur ba bya ba'i phyir gsol ba gdab par bya'o
T02D1264:20a-36: / // de ltar de dag gis dbang bskur ba
T02D1264:20a-37: byas ma thag tu ming gis dbang bskur ba'i rgyal
T02D1264:20a-39: de la thugs dang sangs rgyas rin chen dang //
T02D1264:20a-40: rdo rje chos kyi rgya yis ni //
T02D1264:20a-41: goo r'i tsoo r'i be t'a l'i //
T02D1264:20a-42: ghasma r'i la go rims bzhin //
T02D1264:20a-43: lha mo pukka s'i sogs bzhi //
T02D1264:20a-44: sangs rgyas 'di dag go rims bzhin //
T02D1264:20a-45: de nas rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od
T02D1264:20a-46: zer gyi sgo las byung ba'i mkha' 'gro ma rnams
T02D1264:20b-0: lag pa'i yal gas @20b mchod pa rnam pa sna
T02D1264:20b-3: dge ba ma lus pa sgyu ma lta bur blta ba'i ngo bo dang /
T02D1264:20b-4: de las gzhan pa'i phyi rol gyi mchod pa khyad
T02D1264:20b-5: par can gyi bdag nyid khams gsum pa'i bdag nyid
T02D1264:20b-6: can dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i ngo bo la mchod
T02D1264:20b-7: pa dang / mchod pa po dang mchod pa'i gnas
T02D1264:20b-8: kyi dbye ba'i blo mi bya bar yang dag par
T02D1264:20b-10: sgra'i grong khyer brag ca lta bur shes pas bstod par yang bya'o //
T02D1264:20b-11: rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs kyis khyod //
T02D1264:20b-12: bskor zhing khyod sems mchog thob 'gyur //
T02D1264:20b-13: de yis 'gro ba brtan g-yo sbyangs //
T02D1264:20b-14: thugs rje'i thugs kyis sems can bslang //
T02D1264:20b-15: sgyu ma'i sprul par khyod kyis rdo rje phong //
T02D1264:20b-16: dpal ldan khrag 'thung rdo rjes bdag la thugs kyis dgongs //
T02D1264:20b-17: de nas mdun du yam las byung ba'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor rgyal mtshan gyis mtshan pa'o //
T02D1264:20b-18: de'i steng du ram las byung ba'i me'i dkyil 'khor 'bar bas mchan pa'o //
T02D1264:20b-19: de'i steng du aam las byung ba'i padma'i snod do //
T02D1264:20b-20: de'i dkyil du bdud rtsi lnga dang gsal byed lnga //
T02D1264:20b-21: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i sa bon gyis mtshan pa sbar ba dang /
T02D1264:20b-23: dri ma med par sbyangs pas shel ltar gyur pa
T02D1264:20b-24: de'i steng du h'um las byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs
T02D1264:20b-25: pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje'i
T02D1264:20b-27: aom gyis byin gyis brlabs pa /
T02D1264:20b-28: de'i 'od zer gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D1264:20b-29: kyi ye shes kyi bdud rtsi bkug la de dang
T02D1264:20b-30: ro mnyam par byas pa la de kho na nyid
T02D1264:20b-31: gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs pa /
T02D1264:20b-34: dpe med pa'i smin pa'i rang bzhin h'um las byung ba'i lce dang /
T02D1264:20b-36: nyi ma la bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor tshim par bya
T02D1264:20b-37: zhing mkha' 'gro ma'i dbus na gnas pa'i gtso bo
T02D1264:20b-38: bsgoms pa la yang de nyid kyis so zhes bya
T02D1264:20b-39: ba ni dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog ces bya ba'i ting
T02D1264:20b-40: de 'dzin to / da ni goo r'i la sogs
T02D1264:20b-41: pa'i mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbang
T02D1264:20b-42: phyug mthar thug pa'i re re nas go rims bzhin
T02D1264:20b-43: du phyogs bcur yang dag par spros la /
T02D1264:20b-44: ji ltar rigs par rjes su brtan par byas nas /
T02D1264:21a-0: bya ba byas shing byed pa byas pa'i dkyil 'khor ma lus pa rnam par mi @21a * //
T02D1264:21a-1: rtog pa bde ba'i rang bzhin du blta bar bya'o //
T02D1264:21a-2: de'i rjes la dang po sprul pa'i 'khor lo yi
T02D1264:21a-3: ge aam kha dog nag po 'od dang bcas pa'o
T02D1264:21a-4: // de yongs su gyur pa mar me'i 'od ltar
T02D1264:21a-5: 'bar ba'i 'od zer ba spu'i bu ga nas byung
T02D1264:21a-6: // bas / goo r'i la sogs pa lha mo'i tshogs snang bar byas nas /
T02D1264:21a-7: dkyil 'khor dang dkyil 'khor gyi dbang phyug nag po
T02D1264:21a-8: chen po mig sman nag po bcag pa lta bu'i
T02D1264:21a-9: lus spro zhing bsdu ba bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1264:21a-10: rim pa 'di nyid kyis gnyis par dmar po /
T02D1264:21a-14: drug par dkar po zhes bya ba yan lag drug bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1264:21a-15: phyi nas dga' bral mthar yang de bzhin no //
T02D1264:21a-16: zhes bya ba goo r'i la sogs pa mkha' 'gro
T02D1264:21a-17: ma brgyad rang rang gi phyogs kyi zhal brgyad du
T02D1264:21a-18: bzhugs nas nyid kyi thugs ka'i sa bon gnyug mar
T02D1264:21a-19: gnas par bya'o // de nas bcom ldan 'das ma
T02D1264:21a-20: bdag med ma yang bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kar
T02D1264:21a-22: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyang 'khor lo bzhi po
T02D1264:21a-23: 'od zer gyi tshogs spros pas bdag nyid 'od kyi
T02D1264:21a-25: nyid kyi thugs ka'i nyi ma la gnas pa'i sa bon gnyug ma la 'dug par bya'o //
T02D1264:21a-26: nyi ma yang sa bon la /
T02D1264:21a-27: sa bon yang thig ler gyur nas /
T02D1264:21a-28: thig le dang bcas pa'i 'khor lo gsum ni des
T02D1264:21a-29: mtshon pa bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin 'od zer
T02D1264:21a-30: dkar po'i tshogs kyi rnam pa can du bsgom par
T02D1264:21a-31: bya'o // rim gyis rang gi bdag nyid du zhu bar gyur pas mi dmigs par bya'o //
T02D1264:21a-32: de lta bu'i sems kyi rang bzhin gnyug ma'i ngo
T02D1264:21a-33: bo nyid bde ba chen po'i rnam par ro gcig
T02D1264:21a-34: par gyur to zhes bya ba yin no //
T02D1264:21a-35: bsgoms pas skyo bar gyur na /
T02D1264:21a-37: bdag nyid dang 'khor lo'i rnam pa bsams /
T02D1264:21a-38: aom de ba pi tsu badzra h'um h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a zhes bya ba'i sngags sam /
T02D1264:21a-39: rgyud nas 'byung ba'i rtsa ba'i sngags snying ga'i nyi
T02D1264:21a-40: ma la sngags kyi yi ge mgo gyen du bltas
T02D1264:21a-41: pa dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pa ltar yang dag par
T02D1264:21a-42: gnas pa rab tu 'bar ba rnams yid kyis bris
T02D1264:21a-43: la yid kyis bltas pa 'di ni rdo rje bzlas
T02D1264:21a-44: pa'o // yang na khro po'i bzlas pa bya ste /
T02D1264:21b-0: goo r'i @21b la sogs pa mkha' 'gro ma rnams
T02D1264:21b-1: kyis zhal nas sngags brjod par lhag par mos pa
T02D1264:21b-2: bya'o zhes bya ba ni bzlas pa mdor bsdus pa'o
T02D1264:21b-3: // bzlas pas skyo bar gyur na smon lam gdab par bya ste /
T02D1264:21b-4: rigs bzangs skye dang dam tshig can //
T02D1264:21b-5: rgyags med dgyes pa'i rdo rje 'chad //
T02D1264:21b-6: bla ma la gus snying rje dang //
T02D1264:21b-7: ldan zhing skye zhing skye bar 'gyur //
T02D1264:21b-8: lag pa rdo rje dril bu 'khrol //
T02D1264:21b-9: zab mo'i chos ni 'don pa dang //
T02D1264:21b-10: btsun mo'i khu ba mnyam za bar //
T02D1264:21b-11: skye zhing skye bar 'gyur bar shog / ces bya'o //
T02D1264:21b-12: yang na snga ma bzhin du rang gi lhag pa'i
T02D1264:21b-13: lha'i 'khor gyi 'khor lo yang dag par mchod la
T02D1264:21b-14: / rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gnyug ma las
T02D1264:21b-15: gzhal yas khang yangs shing rgya che bar lhag par
T02D1264:21b-16: mos par byas la mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs khongs su
T02D1264:21b-19: yid kyis langs la bya ba rnams la spyad par bya'o //
T02D1264:21b-20: thun gnyis po gzhan la yang yid dang mthun pa'i gnas su nye bar 'dug la /
T02D1264:21b-21: snga ma bzhin du gzhal yas khang lhag par mos par byas la /
T02D1264:21b-22: de'i dkyil du bdag nyid bdag med ma dang mnyam
T02D1264:21b-23: par 'dus pa'i zhal brgyad pa'i gzugs kyis de kho
T02D1264:21b-25: rang rang gi las nges par byung ba'i mkha' 'gro
T02D1264:21b-26: ma'i tshogs gsal por bltas la gnas ji lta ba
T02D1264:21b-28: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo ma lus pa bde ba
T02D1264:21b-29: chen po'i rang bzhin du bsgoms la mchod pa dang
T02D1264:21b-30: / bstod pa la sogs pa yang bya'o //
T02D1264:21b-31: nyal dus su yang dga' bral mtha' can gyi rnal 'byor mngon sum du byas la /
T02D1264:21b-33: sad pa'i dus su yang pukka s'i la sogs pa
T02D1264:21b-34: lha mo bzhis glus bskul bas langs par bsam mo
T02D1264:21b-35: // langs nas kyang de lta bu nyid du gnas par bya'o //
T02D1264:21b-36: ji srid yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob
T02D1264:21b-37: kyi bar du nyin re bzhin bya'o zhes bya ba
T02D1264:21b-38: ni las rgyal mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
T02D1264:21b-39: to // gal te phyag bcu drug pa la mos par byed na /
T02D1264:21b-40: gzhal yang khang de nyid du phyag drug pa'am phyag bzhi pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1264:21b-41: de la bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi sa bon dang /
T02D1264:22a-0: phyag mtshan la sogs pa ni pha @22a * //
T02D1264:22a-1: rol tu phyin pa drug go //
T02D1264:22a-4: smon pa med pa rnam par dag pas zhal gsum mo //
T02D1264:22a-5: sku dang rtsa ba'i zhal ni 'dam skyes sngon po 'dra'o //
T02D1264:22a-7: g-yas ni zla ba'i 'od lta bu'o //
T02D1264:22a-8: spyan gsum pa skyil krung phyed pas gnas pa //
T02D1264:22a-9: phyag g-yas kyi dang po na rdo rje'o //
T02D1264:22a-10: phyag gnyis pa na gri gug go //
T02D1264:22a-11: phyag g-yon gyi dang po na rtse gsum pa'o //
T02D1264:22a-12: phyag gnyis pa na dril bu'o //
T02D1264:22a-13: phyag lhag mas ni rdo rje lu gu rgyud ma
T02D1264:22a-14: la mnyam par 'khyud pa khams gsum gyi bdag nyid
T02D1264:22a-16: rdo rje lu gu rgyud ma ni mdog sngon po ste /
T02D1264:22a-17: bdag med ma ltar rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'o //
T02D1264:22a-18: gri gug dang thod pa bsnams pa'i phyag gnyis kyis
T02D1264:22a-19: rang gi bdag po gnyug ma'i mgul nas 'khyud par
T02D1264:22a-20: bsgom par bya'o // de bzhin du bdud nges par bcom pa'i rnam par dag pas phyag bzhi ste /
T02D1264:22a-24: skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis mnan pa'o //
T02D1264:22a-25: g-yas kyi dang po na ni rdo rje'o //
T02D1264:22a-26: phyag g-yon gyi dang po na ni mi'i thod pa
T02D1264:22a-27: lha dang lha ma yin gyi khrag gis gang ba'o
T02D1264:22a-28: // phyag lhag mas ni rdo rje phag mo la 'khyud pa'o //
T02D1264:22a-29: bcom ldan 'das ma ni sku mdog sngon mo ste /
T02D1264:22a-30: phyag g-yas dang gzhan la ni gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1264:22a-31: rgyu'i rdo rje 'dzin 'di dag gi phyag mtshan dang 'khor lo yang 'bras bu bzhin te /
T02D1264:22a-32: khyad par zla ba'i gdan dang /
T02D1264:22a-35: phyag bzhi ba la zhal brgyad pa med na yang /
T02D1264:22a-36: mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs rang rang gi phyogs kyi ba spu'i bu gar gzhug par bya'o //
T02D1264:22a-37: aom ki ti ki ti badzra h'um h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1264:22a-38: zhes byas ba ni phyag drug pa'i'o //
T02D1264:22a-39: aom dzva la dzva la bhyo h'um h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1264:22a-40: zhes bya ba ni phyag bzhi pa'i'o //
T02D1264:22a-41: khag ma ni snga ma bzhin du rtogs par bya'o //
T02D1264:22a-42: dpal dan yan lag med rdo rje //
T02D1264:22a-43: ye shes bsam yas brnyes gyur pas //
T02D1264:22a-44: yang dag rjes gnang thob gyur nas //
T02D1264:22a-45: bris kyi mngon pa'i nga rgyal min //
T02D1264:22a-46: bdag gis 'di bris nongs pa rnams //
T02D1264:22b-0: yid dang ldan @22b pa'i mkhas rnams dang //
T02D1264:22b-2: khrag 'thung sgrub thabs byas pa las //
T02D1264:22b-3: legs pa bdag gis gang bsags pa //
T02D1264:22b-4: des ni 'jug rten ma lus rnams //
T02D1264:22b-5: kun mkhyen ye shes pha rol son //
T02D1264:22b-6: dpal rnal 'byor ba yan lag med pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa /
T02D1264:22b-7: dpal dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
T02D1264:22b-9: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po kun du bzang po ldang /
